creator: vinayak.patil1@gmail.com
text:
Hi,
  As per the suggestion for this bug 

https://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=47104

i used the proper name space mentioned in link

http://xmlgraphics.apache.org/fop/0.95/extensions.html#fox-namespace

Now pdf is getting generated but the scrren reader (Adobe reader>>view>>read out loud) is not able to read the text which i provided for the images. am i missing something once again? 

<fo:external-graphic content-width="7cm" content-height="7cm"  scaling="uniform" fox:alt-text="Testing alt text for image" src="/header.jpg"/>

Please could some one point me the right direction or document to get pdf accessibility done.

creator: adelmelle@apache.org
text:
Sorry to get back so late on this.
See the duplicate issue logged in Bugzilla #46705.

Current status: the changes are available in a separate branch in the Subversion repository. I am quite sure that fox:alt-text does not work for FOP 0.95 or Trunk. For that to happen, the branch must first be merged back into the trunk. That said, you're very welcome to try out the code in the branch, and keep us informed (either via fop-dev@ or via comments on bug #46705) about possible issues there.

Thanks!

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 46705 ***

creator: gadams@apache.org
text: batch transition to closed remaining pre-FOP1.0 resolved bugs
